flawed_nl_solution:
After 30 days, there will be enough food left to sustain 300 people for 90 days - 30 days = 40 days.
After the 100 people leave, there will be 300-100 = <<300-100=200>>200 people left.
The 200 people will eat 200/300 = 2/3 as much food as the original group of people in the castle.
The 40 days' worth of food will last this smaller group for 40 days / (2/3) = <<40/(2/3)=60>>60 more days.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
